posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for?: Moderator of JailRP.

2) How old are you? (if you prefer to say this in private, just ask): REDACTED

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone): Texas, USA  -  Central Time

4) Current In-Game Name: Evil-Dalek

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community page: STEAM_0:0:24673284  -  http://steamcommunity.com/id/jkik11

6) Email Address: REDACTED@REDACTED

7) How long have you been involved (frequent player, moderator, donator, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ server:  About 6 months, I would consider myself a frequent player and I donated a while back and am a Super VIP.

8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)?: Moderation in JailRP.

9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?: I really like NNJG and want to try to make the JailRP server as popular as possible by keeping away people who wish to ruin the fun enjoyable experience this server and group has to offer.

10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience: I have been a Super VIP in JailRP for about 5 months and I try to enforce the rules with the powers I have.

11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server?: No.

12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it?: Yes, and yes.

13) Any other Comments or information you can provide: I really like NNJG and want to be apart of it. =D


                          -------Recommendations in order of appearance--------
